## BasicAuthInfo type

Represents basic authentication information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BasicAuthInfo = {
    type: AuthType & AuthType.BASIC;
    username: string;
    password: string;
};
```
**References:** [AuthType](./foundation-comms.authtype.md), [AuthType.BASIC](./foundation-comms.authtype.md)
